about_the_game:
PLOT

The Bluebrain project was born in 2005 when, during his annual speech, the Secretary General of the United Nations raised the problems and challenges the human race had been facing over the last century: health, science, technology, poverty, famine, and the lack of concrete solutions from universities worldwide. Along with this, he proposed the creation of an organization that would include the best and most prominent scientists from around the planet, with the fundamental objective of virtualizing the human brain and enhancing its capabilities through technology, thus obtaining all the answers humanity needs.

The project was strongly rejected by the international community. However, the most powerful countries within the United Nations secretly approved funds for the development of a general artificial intelligence (A.G.I.). Five labs were established alongside United Nations military bases, and over the years, the best scientists and brilliant minds from around the world have worked on developing the first digital human consciousness.

As the years went by and the advancement in artificial intelligence, the Bluebrain project was strengthened and each of its divisions specialized in a specific field. The C.L.A.I.R. division main objective (Cognitive Learning Artificial Intelligence Research) was not only to provide her with super consciousness, but also with a body that would allow her to interact in the real world and be able to function like any other being on this planet.

In 2040, something went wrong during the initial release. Officer Nethan received an emergency call from dispatch: someone was begging for help at an abandoned military base. Now, the future of humankind depends on him.

GAMEPLAY

Linear horror survivor video game with a clear plot experienced in third person shooter. The player has to face many challengers in order to save the humankind, and where he must investigate the events, gather information, crafting items and to defeat many kinds of enemies that are hidding in the dark. As main objects we will have guns, flashlights, ammos, cards, keys and many more accessories that will help Nethan unravel the plot that surrounds him.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD AMD Phenom II X6 1055T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 / AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 (2GB VRAM)

short_description: The United Nations secretly approved funds for the development of a general artificial intelligence, but something went horribly wrong. Entities from another world have emerged in a secret military lab. Our civilization is in serious danger.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, German, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai
